      Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml that return Gather 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Gather<E> Gather.action(E action)
      The next state in the state machine.
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKey(char key)
      The 'finishOnKey' attribute lets you choose one value that submits the received data when entered.
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyEight()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('8').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyFive()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('5').

      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('4').

      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('#').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyNine()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('9').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyOne()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('1').

      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('7').

      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('6').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyStar()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('*').

      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('3').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyTwo()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('2').
      Gather<E> Gather.finishOnKeyZero()
      Convenience function that does the same as finishOnKey('0').
      Gather<E> DeclarativeComposer.gather(NestInGather... nested)
      Inserts a Gather verb into your TwiML.
      Gather<E> Gather.method(Method method)
      The 'method' attribute takes the value 'GET' or 'POST'.
      Gather<E> Gather.methodGET()
      Convenience method that does the same as method(Method.GET).
      Gather<E> Gather.methodPOST()
      Convenience method that does the same as method(Method.POST).
      Gather<E> Gather.numDigits(int numDigits)
      The 'numDigits' attribute lets you set the number of digits you are expecting, and submits the data to the 'action' URL once the caller enters that number of digits.
      Gather<E> Gather.timeout(int secondsToPressNextDigit)
      The 'timeout' attribute sets the limit in seconds that Twilio will wait for the caller to press another digit before moving on and making a request to the 'action' URL.
